ServiceDetail.ctaTitle: Ready to optimize your supply chain?

NotFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found

AboutPage.missionText: Our mission is to provide transparent, efficient, and sustainable logistics solutions, breaking down trade barriers and connecting Vietnamese businesses with the world. Our vision is to become the leading 'Smart Border Logistics' service provider in the region.

timeline.y2025: Establishment of Phu Anh Trading and Transportation Co., Ltd. Commencement of construction for the logistics center at Ta Lung border gate.
timeline.y2026: Officially commence operations. Successfully implement a smart shipment tracking system.
timeline.y2027: Expand branch at Tra Linh border gate, increasing total warehouse area to 100,000 m².

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.description: We are always ready to listen. Connect with Phu Anh using the information below or send your request via the contact form.

faq.q1: What are the company's working hours?
faq.a1: Our office operates from 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Monday to Friday. However, our border gate operations team works 24/7 to ensure continuous cargo clearance.
faq.q2: How can I track my shipment?
faq.a2: You can use the provided Air Waybill (AWB) number to track directly on our website via the 'Track Shipment' box on the homepage or by visiting the Tracking page.
faq.q3: Does Phu Anh provide services for Less than Container Load (LCL)?
faq.a3: Yes, we provide a full range of services for both Full Container Load (FCL) and Less than Container Load (LCL) across borders.

CareersPage.title: Career Opportunities
CareersPage.noOpenings: We currently have no open positions. Please check back later.

CareerDetailPage.applySuccess: Thank you for your application! We will review your profile and contact you if it's a good fit.

ManifestoPage.title: Our Manifesto
ManifestoPage.subtitle: Connecting Commerce - Enhancing Value
ManifestoPage.value1Text: All processes, costs, and order statuses are digitized and provided to customers clearly and accessibly. We believe transparency is the foundation of trust.
ManifestoPage.value2Text: By applying technology and automation, we commit to shortening customs clearance times, optimizing logistics costs, and ensuring your goods reach their destination as quickly as possible.
ManifestoPage.value3Text: The market is constantly changing, and we are always at the forefront. Phu Anh continuously researches and applies new technologies such as AI, IoT to create smart, flexible, and superior logistics solutions.
ManifestoPage.value4Text: Business development must go hand in hand with social and environmental responsibility. We prioritize green transportation solutions, optimize routes to minimize carbon emissions, and build a sustainable logistics ecosystem.

TrackingPage.title: Track Your Shipment Journey
TrackingPage.trackingPlaceholder: Enter 1 or more AWB numbers, separated by commas
TrackingPage.errorDescription: Unable to load information at this time. Please try again later.
TrackingPage.notFoundDescription: We could not find any shipments matching the code: {awbs}. Please check your code again.
TrackingPage.noEvents: No events yet for this shipment.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
WhyChooseUs.point1Text: We apply real-time tracking technology, smart warehouse management (WMS), and electronic customs declarations to ensure your goods are processed quickly and accurately.
WhyChooseUs.point2Text: Our team of experienced specialists is always ready to consult and provide 24/7 support, ensuring all your issues are resolved professionally.
WhyChooseUs.point3Text: Located right at the Tà Lùng border gate, our logistics center is a vital trade bridge, optimizing transportation time and costs between Vietnam and China.
